title: [K-12] IoT-based Mechatronics Project: Smart Environmental Monitoring

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer and smartphone usage skills, general interest in engineering
context.additional_context: Learners primarily use smartphones to conduct team projects for real-life problem-solving. Focuses on cloud data visualization and basic IoT system construction.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the operating principles of IoT-based weather measurement devices using the EMCF framework
Learners can build an IoT system that measures three or more environmental variables (temperature, humidity, etc.) through team-based projects
Learners can apply methods to visualize real-time data and export it as CSV files using the mobile interface (GUI-MEIoT)
Learners can derive practical insights for smart environmental management by analyzing collected data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
